document.full_text: microsoft corp showed off a version of the software company's next operating system, highlighting touchscreen features that would work well on a tablet computer, at the all things digital technology conference on wednesday.
document.title: microsoft shows off new operating system
lines_and_colors: microsoft corp showed off a version of the software company's next operating system, highlighting touchscreen features that would work well on a tablet computer, at the all things digital technology conference on wednesday.
